name: Legend Of Frankenstein Junior: Escape From New Rapa
name_original: Legend Of Frankenstein Junior: Escape From New Rapa
description:
Description

This was the first ever game jam that I had participated in. The game made was a simple stealth/puzzle game. The player is in a maze and has to find the key to unlock the door and escape. Whilst he is doing that, he has to avoid getting captured by one of the four different robots that are patrolling the maze.
